message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $140 is a good one, but I'm still looking to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make $160. Would you be willing to go up to $155?
I'm still a bit hesitant about going up to $155. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $145. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $152.50. Would you be willing to accept?
I'm still not comfortable with $152.50. Would you be willing to meet me at $147?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to accept?
